document_title: Right heart failure: Causes, symptoms, diagnosis, treatment
subsection_content:
According to MSc Vo Anh Minh, patients with right heart failure have quite severe symptoms compared to left heart failure. Patients also need to pay attention so that they can promptly receive treatment from a doctor. Some common symptoms include: (2)
Swelling in the feet, legs, ankles, stomach, liver...; You may have to urinate more often, especially at night; Difficulty breathing, swelling of neck veins; Fast pulse, chest pain; Weight gain, loss of appetite; Cold and sweaty skin; Mental fatigue, confusion and forgetfulness
subsection_title: suy tim phai.json. Symptoms of right heart failure
